items.sentence: What makes you think that Tom will like this?
When was the last time that you ate a cookie?
I think that we have time for a drink or two.
My parents wouldn't allow me to go by myself.
Many people respect you. Don't let them down.
The president's term of office is four years.
With these headphones, I can't hear anything.
You know that you need to do that, don't you?
You know that you have to do that, don't you?
I think we're just prolonging the inevitable.
When I eat a lot at night, I have nightmares.
I was surprised when Tom told me he loved me.
I just wish I knew what to say to my husband.
I wish there were some cute guys in my class.
You knew I was going to kiss Tom, didn't you?
Tom wouldn't tell me why he wanted a divorce.
Who's that cute guy I saw you with yesterday?
The traveler reached his destination at last.
A good coach is like a parent to the players.
Music preferences vary from person to person.
What on earth spurred them to such an action?
The moment he was alone, he wrote the letter.
We had a lot of spontaneous offers from them.
Some of them are healthy, but others are not.
Five years have gone by since my father died.
You can solve the problem in nonviolent ways.
The enemy gave in without further resistance.
The enemy flung fresh troops into the battle.
Apart from the weather, it was a good picnic.
Would you be so kind as to turn the light on?
Watch out for cars when you cross the street.
The drought has done great harm to the crops.
The drought did severe damage to the harvest.
Do you think it's going to rain this weekend?
The moonlight is particularly bright tonight.
We have no objection to you joining our club.
Tom's forehead was covered with perspiration.
You made that mistake on purpose, didn't you?
Everything would be easier if we could float.
We can't find a good sewing machine anywhere.
You should keep this machine clean and lubed.
A language is a key to the heart of millions.
If you want to go swimming, then go swimming.
Who is the best football player in the world?
My family came to Australia when I was three.
Tom's job forces him to interact with people.
The police have been watching our every move.
Tom didn't want to dress like the other boys.
I'm pretty sure that it was Tom who did this.
Tom was the only one who promised to help us.
